title: Once in a Lifetime Request
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Setsuna-chan, please save me! I’ll only ask just this once!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Chika-san? Why are you panicking like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I have a favor to ask you, Setsuna-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ask me? What may it be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I want you to teach me my homework....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Homework, you say?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah. “Have you done your homework for tomorrow?” or so Riko-chan and You-chan asked me, and then I accidentally answered, “I’m all done!” but.... I actually haven’t done anything at all!! The two of them then said, “You’re amazing, Chika-chan!”, so I can’t possibly ask to copy their homework now....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ahaha, so that’s what happened, huh. Alright, let’s do it together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Setsuna-chan!! Thank you so much! You’re my savior!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>But if I just tell you all of the answers, then you’ll never be able to do it, so let’s think of how to solve the problems together, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeeh!? But why~~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
